	Bio:

Hello, my name is Amar, I am 19 years old, and I am from Banoviƒái, Bosnia and Herzegovina where I completed elementary and high school. In Tuzla, I am enrolled at "Internacionalna poslovno-informaciona akademija", where I am majoring in Computer Science and Information Technology. I'm in my third semester, and I can say that I'm doing pretty well. At the moment I'm learning to become a Software Developer, to be precise a Mobile Software Developer. My plan is to start with Android and let the journey take me to the next step. I am a team player that adapts effectively to different situations. I appreciate new challenges and will do everything in my power to overcome them.
